00020 - (EntriesController *)initWithSection:(Section *)s {
00021         if (self = [super initWithNibName:@"EntriesView" bundle:nil]) {
00022                 self.navigationItem.title = s.name;
00023                 self.section = s;
00024         }
00025         
00026         return self;
00027 }
00028 
00029 // Implement viewDidLoad to do additional setup after loading the view, typically from a nib.
00030 - (void)viewDidLoad {
00031     [super viewDidLoad];
00032         
00033         self.navigationController.title = self.section.name;
00034 }
00035 
00036 // Override to allow orientations other than the default portrait orientation.
00037 - (BOOL)shouldAutorotateToInterfaceOrientation:(UIInterfaceOrientation)interfaceOrientation {
00038     // Return YES for supported orientations
00039     return (interfaceOrientation == UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait) ||
00040         (interfaceOrientation == UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft) ||
00041         (interfaceOrientation == UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight);
00042 }

00056 #pragma mark Table view methods
00057 
00058 - (NSInteger)numberOfSectionsInTableView:(UITableView *)tableView {
00059     return 1;
00060 }
00061 
00062 // Customize the number of rows in the table view.
00063 - (NSInteger)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView numberOfRowsInSection:(NSInteger)s {
00064     return [[section entries] count];
00065 }
00066 
00067 // Customize the appearance of table view cells.
00068 - (UITableViewCell *)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView cellForRowAtIndexPath:(NSIndexPath *)indexPath {
00069     
00070     static NSString *CellIdentifier = @"Cell";
00071     
00072     UITableViewCell *cell = [tableView dequeueReusableCellWithIdentifier:CellIdentifier];
00073     if (cell == nil) {
00074         cell = [[[UITableViewCell alloc] initWithStyle:UITableViewCellStyleDefault reuseIdentifier:CellIdentifier] autorelease];
00075     }
00076     
00077         // Configure the cell.
00078         Entry *e = [[[self section] entries] objectAtIndex:[indexPath row]];
00079         [cell.textLabel setText:[e name]];
00080         cell.tag = [[e identifier] intValue];
00081         
00082     return cell;
00083 }
00084 
00085 // Override to support row selection in the table view.
00086 - (void)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView didSelectRowAtIndexPath:(NSIndexPath *)indexPath {
00087         UITableViewCell *cell = [self.tableView cellForRowAtIndexPath:indexPath];
00088         
00089         EntryController *ec = [[EntryController alloc] initWithEntry:[[Database db] entryFromIdentifier:[NSNumber numberWithInt:cell.tag]]];
00090         [self.navigationController pushViewController:ec animated:YES];
00091         [ec release];
00092 }
00093
